tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE refugees_health_status (
    refugee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    country_of_origin VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    medical_treatment_history JSON
);

CREATE TABLE refugees (
  refugee_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  country_of_origin VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE medical_treatments (
  treatment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  refugee_id UUID REFERENCES refugees(refugee_id),
  treatment_date DATE,
  treatment_type VARCHAR(50),
  doctor_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Refugees (
    refugee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    country_of_origin VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Health_Status (
    health_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    refugee_id INT,
    date DATE,
    temperature DECIMAL(5,2),
    blood_pressure VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE refugee_personal_info (
  refugee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  nationality VARCHAR(50),
  gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  refugee_id INT,
  record_date DATE,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  treatment VARCHAR(100),
  doctor_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE treatment_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  record_id INT,
  treatment_date DATE,
  treatment_description TEXT,
  treatment_duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE health_status (
  status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  refugee_id INT,
  status_date DATE,
  blood_pressure VARCHAR(20),
  temperature FLOAT,
  symptoms TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE refugees (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  nationality VARCHAR(50),
  address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE health_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  refugee_id INT,
  treatment VARCHAR(200),
  date DATE,
  doctor VARCHAR(100),
  diagnosis TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE medication (
  medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  dosage VARCHAR(50),
  side_effects TEXT,
  usage_instructions TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE medical_staff (
  staff_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  specialization VARCHAR(100),
  department VARCHAR(100),
  contact_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE medical_facilities (
  facility_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  contact_number VARCHAR(20),
  capacity INT
)
